channel.title: Norton Blocking No-Ip Client
channel.description:
Hey, when I try to download the No-Ip client to run my server instead of Hamachi Norton freaken blocks it. First of all is No-Ip a virus like it says (DOUBT IT), and second is if it isn't how to you allow it to download without interruption? Btw a heuristic virus is a possible virus...not for sure 1 which confirms my doubts lol... Thanks Info Below:
Full Path: c:\users\MYCOMPUTER\downloads\unconfirmed 48765.crdownload ____________________________ ____________________________ On computers as of: 22/02/2012 at 9:14:21 PM Last Used: 22/02/2012 at 9:16:17 PM Startup Item: No Launched: No ____________________________ ____________________________ Very Few Users Fewer than 5 users in the Norton Community have used this file. ____________________________ High This file risk is high. ____________________________ Threat Details Threat type: Heuristic Virus. Detection of a threat based on malware heuristics. ____________________________ Origin Downloaded from URL Not Available
Source File: unconfirmed 48765.crdownload ____________________________ File Actions File: c:\users\MYCOMPUTER\downloads\unconfirmed 48765.crdownload Removed ____________________________ File Thumbprint - SHA: 3caac92aa82fb937ffeccd21e2464bb1cda363debf42257135c2dbad0dee844b ____________________________ File Thumbprint - MD5: d1aaba9d79ff430f98f645f27566c251 ____________________________

item.title: Norton Blocking No-Ip Client
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

I looked it up and theres a bunch…but everything I could find was for older versions of Norton, thanks…
Offline now bye.

Read full topic

item.title: Norton Blocking No-Ip Client
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

I’m sure you there’s an option to allow it as an exception if you are the administrator of your computer.

Read full topic

Hey, when I try to download the No-Ip client to run my server instead of Hamachi Norton freaken blocks it.
